full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/18/2023 ADDRESS OFFICIAL COMMUNICATIONS TO THE SECRETARY OF STATE WASHINGTON 25, D.C. DEPARTMENT OF STATE WASHINGTON August 27, 1948. In reply refer to W130- Wong Guck On REC'D IN MAIL UNIT DEPT. OF JUSTICE AUG 30 1948 Mr. Watson B. Miller, I & N SERVICE 1 V Commissioner, OUT SEP 7 1948 Immigration and Naturalization Service, Washington 25, D.C. Sawn Sir: The Department is endeavoring to verify the American citizenship of Wong Guck On , who alleges that he was born at Sun Loong Vill. Toy San, Kwangtungon China July 17, 1918 , and who appears to have obtained Certificate of Identity No. 67098 , issued at San Pedro, Cal. on approximately Oct. 21, 1932. It will be appreciated if you will verify the issuance of the document mentioned above and will state whether the person concerned was admitted to the United States as an American citizen, and, if'so, upon what date. It is requested that a report be obtained from your field office by air mail. Unable to verify Very truly yours, SEP 7 1948 searched by M. King 48 Corres, Index R. R. .B. B. Shipley, Shipling INDEXED Date 9-1-48 Chief, Passport Division Enclosure: Unable to Verify Immigration Index Copy of this letter. Date 9-1-48 Searched by m. King DSL-323 4-21-48 PD-179
